mapper.sql: id, unit_name, unit_name_en, parent_id, organization_form, unit_type, parent_node_name, charge_section_id, charge_section_name, local_financial_code, local_financial_name, office_administration_code, office_administration_name, administration_division_code, administration_division_name, budget_code, college_code, organization_code, unit_type_code, unit_type_name, unit_basic_property, social_credit_code, budget_unit_name, budget_unit_code, budget_management_level, firm_name, firm_code, telephone_number, phone_number, fax_number, email_address, province, city, county, street_address, postal_code, fund_supply_mode_name, fund_supply_mode_code, administration_level_name, administration_level_type, department_category_name, business_department_classification_code, principal, contact, corporate_representative, economic_type, financial_affiliation, financial_unit, vertical_unit, virtual_unit, accounting_system, corporate_tag, maintainer_mark, supplier_mark, manufacture_mark, asset_disposal_agency_tag, state_asset_management_company, authorized_number, administration_authority, enable_time, disable_time, seal_time, unit_remark, asset_download_status, latitude_and_longitude, created_time, is_deleted, status, sort, tenant_code
mapper.select: select * from as_organ_tree where unit_name = #{unitName} and status = 1

SELECT
FROM as_organ_tree WHERE status != 0 ORDER BY sort ASC

SELECT
FROM as_organ_tree WHERE status != 0 ORDER BY sort ASC
SELECT * FROM as_organ_tree ot WHERE ot.parent_id = #{id} AND ot.`status` != 0 ORDER BY sort ASC
SELECT * FROM as_organ_scene os WHERE os.`status` != 0 AND os.scene_id = #{id} ORDER BY os.id ASC
SELECT * FROM as_organ_scene os WHERE os.`status` = 1 AND os.scene_id = #{id} AND os.node_id = #{nodeId} ORDER BY os.id ASC
SELECT * FROM as_organ_tree WHERE unit_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{unitName}, '%') AND status != 0 AND is_deleted = 0
SELECT * FROM as_organ_scene os WHERE os.parent_id = #{parentId} AND os.`status` != 0 AND os.scene_id = #{sceneId} ORDER BY os.id ASC
